title: Fix intake document upload JSON parse error
scope: Identify the frontend upload request and response parsing behavior
Align backend upload response to valid JSON and handle non-JSON errors safely
Confirm upload works for common file types in the intake flow
acceptance_criteria: Tenant intake document upload completes without JSON parse errors
Upload errors are surfaced with a clear message even if the server returns non-JSON
risk_notes: Changes to upload parsing could mask server-side validation errors
Mismatch between frontend expectations and backend response could regress uploads
rollback_plan: Revert changes to the upload handler and response parsing
